item.description:
I have had the privilege of learning a lot about RE investing this past year but am still a novice. All of us need education to succeed. I think the best thing I can do for all of us is to solicit you and/or your colleagues to offer some training to us all.

 

This can be on a specific topic like short sales, or even an update on trends you are seeing as a RE agent. Send your ideas in and let's get moving.

 

  • Who can present a topic?  Are you a realtor with a lot of investment experience or do you know on? Do you know a good mortgage broker or an REO manager from a local bank??  
  • If you are or know a good Investor friendly RE agent who knows how to package and close REO deals, come on down!  
  • Have you sat in on a live or web training session recently and have something to share?
  • What book or tape program have you found useful - present something from it!?

 

FYI this venue is just a couple of blocks from Downtown Crossing.
item.how_to_find_us: There is a small area reserved next to the bar as you come into the restaurant. A la carte food & cash bar.
item.name: RE Investor Training!
